description: Try our easy to follow Greek Salad With Pasta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Greek salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Summer,Father's Day,High protein,High fibre,Vegetarian,Pasta salad,Tomato,Peanut free
name: Greek Salad With Pasta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 green capsicum, deseeded (cut into thin strips)
1 small red onion, halved lengthways (thinly sliced)

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta in a large saucepan of boiling salted water following packet instructions or until just tender. Rinse, drain and cool. Whisk oil, vinegar and garlic in a bowl. Season to taste.
Toss pasta, tomato, cucumber, capsicum, onion, olives, feta and oregano in a large bowl. Add dressing, top with mint and serve.
